original_text: They killed all the descendants of Amalek who were still alive. They took their land and they still live there now.
korean_text: 피신하여 살아남은 아말렉 사람을 치고 오늘까지 거기에 거주하고 있더라

sentences.original_text: They killed all the descendants of Amalek
and they still live there now
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 지금도 그곳에 살고 있습니다
